title: Software Developer
description: Built mobile apps using React Native for Android and iOS. Developed company webapp and landing page using React and TailwindCSS. Improved app performance to 45MB size and 2-second startup time.

title: Research
description: Researched web page quality and speed, validated web metrics through practical experiments, and scraped real-world data using Headless Puppeteer and Python. Automated metric evaluation with Lighthouse and JavaScript.
